org.fax4j.x2fax.http.servlet
Class Web2FaxHttpServlet

java.lang.Object
  javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
          org.fax4j.x2fax.http.servlet.AbstractWeb2FaxHttpServlet
              org.fax4j.x2fax.http.servlet.Web2FaxHttpServlet
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig
public class Web2FaxHttpServlet
extends AbstractWeb2FaxHttpServlet

This servlet enables to send faxes based on data provided in the HTTP request.
This class also provides (via VendorPolicy class) the ability to restrict access, bill customers and so on, before the fax is submitted.

Since:
0.01
Version:
1.03
Author:
Sagie Gur-Ari
See Also:
Serialized Form
